item.title: 随着娱乐性大麻将列入佛罗里达州选票，大麻生产商数量攀升
item.description: 周一，佛罗里达州最高法院允许选民在 11 月份的选票上通过全民公决的方式决定在该州娱乐性使用大麻的命运，此后，在美国上市的大麻生产商的股票在周二盘前上涨。【原文：U.S.-listed shares of pot producers rise premarket on Tuesday after the Florida Supreme Court on Monday allowed voters to decide on the fate of recreational use of marijuana in the state through a referendum on the November ballot.】

item.title: 亚马逊为初创企业使用包括 Anthropic 在内的人工智能模型提供免费积分
item.description: 亚马逊网络服务公司（AWS）在接受路透社采访时表示，该公司已经扩大了面向初创企业的免费积分计划，以支付使用主要人工智能模型的费用，因为该公司希望提高其人工智能平台Bedrock的市场份额。【原文：Amazon Web Service (AWS) has expanded its free credits program for startups to cover the costs of using major AI models, the company told Reuters in an interview, as it looks to boost the market share of its AI platform Bedrock.】

item.title: 中国华为投资公司计划分红 107 亿美元
item.description: 上海清算所周二表示，中国华为投资有限公司拟向股东分红 770.95 亿元人民币（约合 106.5 亿美元），但未作详细说明。【原文：China's Huawei Investment & Holding Co intends to distribute shareholder dividends amounting to 77.095 billion yuan ($10.65 billion), the Shanghai clearing house said on Tuesday without elaborating.】

item.title: 通用电气完成三方分拆，与辉煌历史决裂
item.description: 通用电气公司周二完成了拆分为三家公司的工作，标志着这个曾经是美国商业力量象征的工业集团先驱时代的结束。【原文：General Electric on Tuesday completed its breakup into three companies, marking the end of an era for the industrial conglomerate pioneer that was once a symbol of American business power.】

item.title: 医疗保险公司下滑，期货下跌，关注数据和美联储发言人
item.description: 受医疗保险公司股票大幅下跌的影响，美国股指期货周二下跌，投资者在等待更多的经济数据和美联储官员的评论，以寻找有关降息时机的暗示。【原文：U.S. stock index futures dipped on Tuesday, hurt by sharp losses in shares of health insurers, while investors awaited more economic data and comments from Federal Reserve officials for hints on the timing of interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 美国第一季度新车销量可能增长，延续近期连涨势头
item.description: 分析师称，由于人们对跨界 SUV、皮卡的持续青睐以及新车供应量的增加，第一季度美国汽车销量可能会以中等个位数的百分比增长，延续去年的涨势。【原文：U.S. auto sales likely rose by a mid single-digit percentage in the first quarter, adding to gains made last year on sustained appetite for crossover SUVs, pickup trucks and better supply of new vehicles, analysts say.】

item.title: 拜登政府批准第八个美国海上风电项目
item.description: 美国内政部周二批准了该国第八个商业规模的海上风电项目，该项目将建在马萨诸塞州海岸附近，为超过 90 万户家庭提供电力。【原文：The U.S. Interior Department on Tuesday approved the country's eighth commercial-scale offshore wind project, which will be built off the coast of Massachusetts, bringing online electricity to power more than 900,000 homes.】

item.title: 特朗普与倾销投机者押注真理社交 "备忘录 "股票
item.description: 穆罕默德-阿尔-沙卢迪（Mohammed Al Shalloudi）是阿拉伯联合酋长国一名 21 岁的研究生数据分析师，他投资了唐纳德-特朗普的社交媒体公司。【原文：Mohammed Al Shalloudi, a 21-year-old graduate data analyst in the United Arab Emirates who invested in Donald Trump's social media company, has little in common with the former U.S. president's political supporters.】

item.title: 美国气候法促进了太阳能和电池的发展，而氢能和其他措施则相对滞后
item.description: 分析师和科学家们表示，自乔-拜登总统的《通货膨胀削减法》（IRA）于2022年通过以来，美国的碳减排速度已经翻了一番，有80多个太阳能、风能和储能项目利用了该法的直接付款和税收抵免组合。【原文：The U.S. has doubled the pace of cutting carbon emissions since President Joe Biden's Inflation Reduction Act (IRA) passed in 2022, analysts and scientists said, with more than 80 solar, wind and energy storage projects taking advantage of the law's mix of direct payments and tax credits.】

item.title: 早间竞价：工厂稳步发展，美元一路走高
item.description: 阿曼达-库珀（Amanda Cooper）对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Amanda Cooper.】

item.title: 美国医疗保险公司下滑，因为最终的医疗保险优势费率引发了利润受挫的担忧
item.description: 周二，美国医疗保险公司的股价在盘前下跌了 4% 到 9%，原因是医疗保险优势医疗计划提供商的报销率与最初的提案相比没有变化，这引发了人们对明年利润率将受到挤压的担忧。【原文：Shares of U.S. health insurers dropped between 4% and 9% premarket on Tuesday after reimbursement rates to providers of Medicare Advantage health plans were unchanged from the initial proposal, raising worries about a squeeze on margins next year.】

item.title: 美国监管机构调查资产管理公司在银行中的作用 - 华尔街日报
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二报道，银行监管机构正在调查资产管理巨头贝莱德（BlackRock）、先锋（Vanguard）和道富（State Street）在投资美国银行时是否坚持被动角色。【原文：Banking regulators are probing if asset management giants BlackRock , Vanguard and State Street are sticking to their passive roles when it comes to investments in U.S. banks, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 日本专家小组呼吁摆脱刺激驱动型经济
item.description: 在日本央行决定结束长达八年的负利率政策后，一个政府小组周二表示，日本必须将政策重点从危机模式的刺激政策转向实现私营部门驱动的经济增长。【原文：Japan must shift its policy focus away from crisis-mode stimulus towards achieving private sector-driven economic growth, a government panel said on Tuesday in the wake of the central bank's decision to end eight years of negative interest rates.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦征求购买国旗航空公司股份的意向
item.description: 巴基斯坦私有化小组周二表示，作为国际货币基金组织（IMF）敦促的改革的一部分，巴基斯坦将出售亏损的国家航空公司巴基斯坦国际航空公司 51% 至 100% 的股份。【原文：Pakistan is putting on the block a stake ranging from 51% to 100% of loss-making national carrier Pakistan International Airlines , the privatisation panel said on Tuesday, as part of reforms urged by the IMF.】

item.title: 过去 12 个月伊朗石油出口额达 350 亿美元 - 伊通社
item.description: 据伊朗劳工通讯社报道，伊朗海关总署署长穆罕默德-雷兹瓦尼法尔（Mohammad Rezvanifar）周二表示，截至 2024 年 3 月底的 12 个月内，伊朗石油出口额达到 358 亿美元。【原文：Iran's oil exports reached $35.8 billion in the 12 months to end-March 2024, Iran's head of Customs Mohammad Rezvanifar said on Tuesday according to the Iranian Labour News Agency.】

item.title: 白宫为互联网补贴计划做最后努力
item.description: 白宫官员说，白宫计划在 4 月份再次推动说服国会延长一项有 2,300 万美国家庭使用的互联网补贴计划，时间就在该计划资金耗尽前几周。【原文：The White House plans to renew a push in April to convince Congress to extend an internet subsidy program used by 23 million American households just weeks before it runs out of money, officials said.】

item.title: 特斯拉中国制造电动汽车 3 月销量同比增长 0.2
item.description: 中国乘用车联席会（CPCA）周二公布的数据显示，美国汽车制造商特斯拉 3 月份在中国销售了 89,064 辆电动汽车，同比增长 0.2%。【原文：U.S. automaker Tesla sold 89,064 China-made electric vehicles in March, a 0.2% increase from a year earlier, China Passenger Car Association (CPCA) data showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 世界银行今年将首次发行高达 10 亿美元的混合债券
item.description: 一位高级管理人员告诉路透社记者，随着开发银行面临越来越大的压力，需要找到新的方法来增加贷款，世界银行正寻求今年在资本市场上首次发行高达 10 亿美元的混合票据。【原文：The World Bank is looking to issue up to $1 billion in a debut hybrid note on capital markets this year, a senior executive told Reuters, as development banks face increasing pressure to find new ways to boost their lending.】

item.title: 中国银行称净息差将继续面临压力
item.description: 中国银行（BoC）表示，其净息差（衡量盈利能力的重要指标）今年仍将面临巨大压力。【原文：Bank of China (BoC) said its net interest margin - a key gauge of profitability - will still face significant pressure this year.】

item.title: 聚焦：巴西的 Pix 支付正在扼杀现金。下一个是信用卡吗？
item.description: 在短短三年时间里，巴西大受欢迎的 Pix 支付系统已成为该国最受欢迎的支付方式，在许多情况下取代了现金和电汇，现在已威胁到信用卡在蓬勃发展的电子商务领域的主导地位。【原文：In just three years, Brazil's hugely popular Pix payment system has become the country's favorite way to pay, replacing cash and wire transfers in many cases and now threatening the dominance of credit cards in the booming e-commerce sector.】

item.title: 第一季度销量下滑后，比亚迪或将电动车销量冠军头衔拱手让给特斯拉
item.description: 中国最大的电动汽车（EV）制造商比亚迪报告称，2024 年第一季度的销量比 2023 年第四季度下降了 43%，这可能意味着它将把全球最大电动汽车销售商的头衔交还给特斯拉，而特斯拉去年曾赢得过这一头衔。【原文：BYD, China's biggest electric vehicle (EV) maker, reported first quarter 2024 sales fell 43% compared to the fourth quarter of 2023, which may mean it will hand back the title of world's biggest EV seller to Tesla after winning it last year.】

item.title: 中国取消对澳大利亚葡萄酒的关税，结束长达三年的贸易冻结
item.description: 中国商务部周四表示，中国将从 3 月 29 日起取消对澳大利亚葡萄酒征收的反倾销和反补贴关税，结束长达三年的惩罚性征税，为澳大利亚葡萄酒生产商提供期待已久的救济。【原文：China will lift anti-dumping and anti-subsidy tariffs on Australian wine from March 29, the Chinese commerce ministry said on Thursday, ending three years of punitive levies and offering long-awaited relief to Australian wine producers.】

item.title: 世界银行将斯里兰卡 2024 年的经济增长预测上调至 2.2
item.description: 世界银行周二上调了对斯里兰卡经济的预测，预计该国经济在2024年将增长2.2%，因为这个遭受危机重创的国家正以快于预期的速度从数十年来最严重的金融危机中恢复过来。【原文：The World Bank raised its forecast for Sri Lanka's economy on Tuesday, projecting a growth of 2.2% for 2024, as the crisis-hit nation makes a faster-than-expected recovery from its worst financial crisis in decades.】

item.title: 世界银行称南亚创造的就业机会滞后于人口增长
item.description: 世界银行周二表示，南亚经济体创造就业的速度跟不上劳动适龄人口增长的速度，使该地区面临 "浪费人口红利 "的风险。【原文：Job creation in South Asian economies is not keeping pace with the rise in the working age population, putting the region on a path that risks "squandering its demographic dividend", the World Bank said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 瑞银集团启动 20 亿美元新股票回购计划
item.description: 瑞银集团周二宣布启动一项新的股票回购计划，金额高达 20 亿美元。【原文：UBS on Tuesday announced it was launching a new share buyback programme of up to $2 billion.】

item.title: Cryptoverse：以太币受制于现货 ETF 提议的命运
item.description: 加密货币以太坊正努力追赶飙升的老大哥比特币。【原文：Cryptocurrency ether is struggling to keep pace with soaring big brother bitcoin.】

item.title: 印度 3 月份工厂增长创 16 年新高，招聘人数回升
item.description: 一项调查显示，由于需求加速，印度制造业在 3 月份实现了稳健增长，增速为 16 年来最快。【原文：India's manufacturing industry enjoyed solid growth in March, expanding at the fastest pace in 16 years thanks to accelerating demand, according to a survey that also showed hiring increased at the strongest rate in six months.】

item.title: 边疆航空公司大修网络，转而提供高级座位以求东山再起
item.description: 美国廉价航空公司边疆航空公司（Frontier Airlines）首席执行官告诉路透社，该公司正集中精力发展西雅图和底特律等 "高票价 "市场的网络，而牺牲了在拉斯维加斯和佛罗里达等休闲市场的业务，以期提高收益。【原文：U.S. no-frills carrier Frontier Airlines is focusing on growing its network in "high fare" markets like Seattle and Detroit at the expense of its footprint in leisure markets such as Las Vegas and Florida in a bid to lift earnings, its CEO told Reuters.】

item.title: 政府称泰国前三个月游客人数达 940 万，消费额达 124 亿美元
item.description: 泰国旅游部周二表示，今年前三个月，泰国共接待了 940 万名外国游客，估计这些游客为泰国经济带来了 4,546 亿泰铢（约合 124 亿美元）的消费。【原文：Thailand recorded 9.4 million foreign tourists in the first three months of this year, who contributed an estimated 454.6 billion baht ($12.4 billion) to the economy in spending, the tourism ministry said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价日元警戒令市场保持紧张
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】
